Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
Delivered by:  Father James P. Hayes, St. Andrews R.C. Church, Cardinal Hayes Place, New York, NY  10007.

Motion to spread the invocation in full upon the record by COUNCIL MEMBER RIVERA.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by Father James P. Hayes, St. Andrew's Roman Catholic Church, Cardinal Hayes Place, New York, N.Y. 10007.

Council Member Rivera moved  that the invocation be spread in full upon the Minutes and adopted.

Items.Title: Adoption of Minutes
Items.AgendaNote: Motion that the Minutes of the Stated Meetings of August 22nd, September 13th, and September 21, 2001 be adopted and printed by Council Member Quinn.
Items.MinutesNote: Council Member Quinn moved that the Minutes of the Stated Meeting of August 22, 2001, September 13, 2001, September 21, 2001 be adopted and printed.

Pursuant to Rule 11.20(c) of the Council and Section 197-d (b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Procedure Application Number 010381 PPM, a disposition of City-owned property shall be subject to Council review. Items.Title: Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges, and Elections

Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections appointing VICTOR L. ROBLES as City Clerk and Clerk of the Council

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which preconsidered on October 12, 2001, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to Section 48 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the appointment of VICTOR L. ROBLES as City Clerk and Clerk of the Council for the term expiring May 12, 2006.

Res. 2081

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT OF VICTOR L. ROBLES AS CITY CLERK AND CLERK OF THE COUNCIL

By Council Member Povman

RESOLVED, that pursuant to Section 48 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment of VICTOR L. ROBLES as City Clerk and Clerk of the Council for the term expiring May 12, 2006.
Items.MatterName: M 1307 - Victor L. Robles, The City Clerk of the Council

Items.Title: Rules, Privileges, and Elections

Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections appointing VICTOR L. ROBLES as City Clerk and Clerk of the Council

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which preconsidered on October 12, 2001, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to Section 48 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the appointment of VICTOR L. ROBLES as City Clerk and Clerk of the Council for the term expiring May 12, 2006.

Res. 2081

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT OF VICTOR L. ROBLES AS CITY CLERK AND CLERK OF THE COUNCIL

By Council Member Povman

RESOLVED, that pursuant to Section 48 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment of VICTOR L. ROBLES as City Clerk and Clerk of the Council for the term expiring May 12, 2006.
Items.MatterName: M 1307 - Victor L. Robles, The City Clerk of the Council

Items.MinutesNote:
Whereupon on motion of the Speaker (Council Member Vallone), the Clerk of the Council adjourned to meet again on Wednesday, October 31, 2001.

RAYMOND TEATUM, First Deputy City Clerk
Acting Clerk of the Council


(Note: After the Stated Meeting, Victor Robles was sworn in as the City Clerk and Clerk of the Council.)
At this point the Speaker (Council Member Vallone) made the following announcements
At this point, The Public Advocate (Mr. Green) assumed the chair.
